fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: The color of the badge's [label] text.

fields.name: smallSize
fields.desc: The diameter of the badge if [label] is null.

fields.name: largeSize
fields.desc: The badge's height if [label] is non-null.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding added to the badge's label.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: Combined with [offset] to determine the location of the [label] relative to the [child].

fields.name: offset
fields.desc: Combined with [alignment] to determine the location of the [label] relative to the [child].

fields.name: label
fields.desc: The badge's content, typically a [Text] widget that contains 1 to 4 characters.

fields.name: isLabelVisible
fields.desc: If false, the badge's [label] is not included.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget that the badge is stacked on top of.
